page.title: 18Lack of amenities in Gayton
page.content:
Gayton has two pubs, one hotel, one post office, one post box, one bus a day and one public telephone kiosk - but no other amenities. The village used to have two shops and a bakery (the only remnant of which is an "interesting feature" in one of the pubs) and other services such as a doctor and a blacksmith but these all closed down. In recent years to solve the problems caused by these losses in villages such as Gayton many services have become mobile. The following visit Gayton each week. Mobile Library Mobile Chiropodist Mobile Fishman Mobile Greengrocer Mobile Butcher Mobile Blacksmith
The people of Gayton and nearby Tiffield also run a community mini-bus.
